string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: This app is supportable in devices like android-mobiles, android-tablets, android-laptops. This approach is very helpful and economic as the user need not to purchase a costly laptop/desktop for managing their inventory.

This app has properties like adding employees, adding suppliers, adding categories, adding products, billing, company finance, viewing stocks, dashboard, etc. The user can navigate these functionality with ease.
This app provides multi-device property where the user can login the same account in different devices. This contains parallel data synchronization among the devices.
This app has a very secured server and all the data of the user\'s inventory are stored in the server. This provides a very great data integrity.
This app has a scanner which can scan bar codes and QR codes. This feature is helpful in reducing the user\'s effort while manually typing products.
This app has a dashboard which provides a graphical view of monthly product flow. This feature helps the user to better understand about flow.
This app has a notification option which helps user to get notified about the products which are out of stock and the products which is going to be expired.
